description: This file initializes a knowledge base with a PDF document, sets up an agent with that knowledge, and queries the agent for information about Thai curry.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class representing a knowledge base built from PDF URLs, supporting vector-based search.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent that interacts with the knowledge base to answer queries.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Loads the knowledge base, optionally recreating its data.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response to a query, optionally formatted in markdown.
